[vc_cta text="Radiology" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" align="center" heading_sep="yes" tag="h2" h2="Radiology" txt_align="center" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""][/vc_cta]
[vc_column_text]Radiology is a medical speciality that employs the use of imaging for diagnosis and treatment of diseases visualised with in the body.

The department provides a full range of radiological diagnosis services like

  • Digital X-ray
  • Ultra Sound
  • ECG and Echo
  • Color doppler

Coming Soon

  • CT Scan
  • 4D ultra Sound
  • C- arm

The hospital is equipped with the state of art technologically advanced medical diagnose equipment to ensure the bes diagnosis out put for our patients.

This department is open 24hrs and managed by highly competent specialist radiologist dedicated to provide round the clock services to our clients[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4992″ img_size=”800*500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4991″ img_size=”800*500″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”5096″ img_size=”800*500″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
